| History                 = 

Singularity Investigations, know as SI for short, is a company owned and operated by [[Dafydd ap Andras (Earth-6124)|Damian Tryp]]. SI is a kind of a security outfit for the rich and famous,{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #2}} but also provides a number of different services legal representation{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #3}} and bioengineering.{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #10}}

After [[Decimation|M-Day]], Singularity Investigations began to come into direct competition with [[James Madrox (Earth-616)|Madrox's]] [[X-Factor Investigations (Earth-616)|X-Factor Investigations]].{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #2}} Ancient Tryp claimed that he and SI were trying to prevent [[Earth-TRN164|a possible future]] where [[Homo superior|mutants]] have become drunken with power and destroy civilization.{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #12}} To prevent this grim future, SI hired [[Henry Buchanan (Earth-616)|Dr. Henry Buchanan]] to create a modified version of  the [[Legacy Virus]] to target former mutants.{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #10}} When X-Factor found out they infiltrated the SI headquarters, and [[James Madrox (The X-Factor) (Earth-616)|one of Madrox's dupes]] blew up the SI building ending Singularity and killing Tryp Junior and Senior.{{r|X-Factor Vol 3 #12}}
